messages.title: Ready for Change
messages.content: This country desperately needs a change of government. For that to happen, we must win here in South Swindon. Trust in politicians has nose-dived recently, but I can promise a fresh start. I am honoured to be the Conservative candidate, living with my family here in the constituency, and am ready to serve as your local MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work with councils to freeze council tax for two years.
Check whether people on Incapacity Benefit are fit to work.
Introduce a new Bill of Rights to strengthen Britain's traditional liberties.
Cut the number of MPs, ministers and quangos.
Make sure our brave troops are properly equipped to do their jobs.
Reward families in the tax and benefit system.
Get to grips with the national debt and public spending.
Improve our vital public services and protect the NHS.
Ensure no government could hand over power to the EU without a referendum.
Put more police officers on the beat and double magistrates' sentencing powers.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensure no government could hand over power to the EU without a referendum.
issues.economy: Get to grips with the national debt and public spending.
issues.governance: Introduce a new Bill of Rights to strengthen Britain's traditional liberties. Cut the number of MPs, ministers and quangos.
issues.health: Improve our vital public services and protect the NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Check whether people on Incapacity Benefit are fit to work. Reward families in the tax and benefit system.

leaflet.personalStatement: This country desperately needs a change of government. For that to happen, we must win here in South Swindon. Trust in politicians has nose-dived recently, but I can promise a fresh start. I am honoured to be the Conservative candidate, living with my family here in the constituency, and am ready to serve as your local MP.

contactInformation.address: Swindon Conservatives, 1 Dorcan Business Village, Murdock Road, Swindon SN3 5HY

images.caption: Robert Buckland with various individuals in different settings, representing community involvement and campaigning efforts.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains images showing the candidate's community engagement, but explicit dates, direct quotes, political role experiences, and endorsements are not visible or mentioned.
